name: .VSDX File Extension
summary: Learn about .VSDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open, edit, save, and convert VSDX files with Microsoft Visio (Windows). You can also open VSDX files with third-party apps, including:
Draw, which is included in the free LibreOffice suite (multiplatform)
Google Chrome web browser (with the Free Visio Viewer extension installed)

If you do not have a program that supports the VSDX format you can still view the contents of a VSDX file by renaming the .vsdx extension to .zip and unzipping the file with Microsoft Windows Explorer (bundled with Windows) or Apple Archive Utility (bundled with macOS). Keep in mind that viewing the contents of a VSDX file using this method differs from viewing it with an application that supports the format.
Several applications, including Microsoft Visio, LibreOffice, and CS Odessa ConceptDraw PRO, can convert VSDX files to other formats.
For example, Microsoft Visio can convert VSDX files to one of the following formats:

Google Chrome with Free Visio Viewer extension
